statements: SELECT id, name, gender, age, course_id, registration_date FROM student_data;
SELECT name, age FROM student_data WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM student_data WHERE age > 20;
SELECT name, gender FROM student_data WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT id, name, registration_date FROM student_data WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_data WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY registration_date DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, gender FROM student_data WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, gender FROM student_data WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 ORDER BY age ASC, registration_date DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM student_data WHERE course_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, gender FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT student_name, subject, score FROM students JOIN student_scores ON students.student_id = student_scores.student_id WHERE semester = 2;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, subject FROM student_scores GROUP BY subject ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 AND grade_level = 11;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students WHERE grade_level = 9 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, subject, score FROM students s JOIN student_scores ss ON s.student_id = ss.student_id WHERE ss.subject = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM student_scores WHERE semester = 2 ORDER BY score DESC, subject ASC;
SELECT * FROM students_data WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students_data WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM student_logs WHERE log_type = 'attendance' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM student_logs GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade, enrollment_date FROM students_data WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_duration > 30;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students_data JOIN courses ON students_data.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, log_date, activity_description FROM students_data JOIN student_logs ON students_data.student_id = student_logs.student_id WHERE log_type = 'attendance';
SELECT MAX(grade), MIN(grade), AVG(grade) FROM students_data;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, date_of_birth FROM students;
SELECT student_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'Jane Doe' OR course_description LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY course_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT students.student_name, courses.course_name, enrollments.enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE courses.course_name = 'Math' ORDER BY enrollments.enrollment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE grade = 'A' AND student_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT student_name, grade, exam_score FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN grades ON enrollments.enrollment_id = grades.enrollment_id WHERE exam_score >= 90 ORDER BY exam_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students WHERE major='Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT enrollment_date, grade FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_id=1;
SELECT MAX(score) AS max_score FROM grades WHERE assignment_id=2;
SELECT student_name, major, birthdate FROM students WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT student_name, major, birthdate FROM students WHERE major = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT course_name, credits, lecturer FROM courses WHERE department = 'Mathematics';
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN grades ON enrollments.enrollment_id = grades.enrollment_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, score FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN grades ON enrollments.enrollment_id = grades.enrollment_id WHERE score >= 80 ORDER BY score DESC;
